Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local Elixir = Tool.Handle
local flightSpin local flightPower local flightHold
local cooldownCo
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid
local fire
local wingActive
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Tool.Enabled = true
local fireball = Instance.new("Part") fireball.Size = Vector3.new(5, 5, 5) fireball.Transparency = 0.5 fireball.Shape = "Ball" fireball.FormFactor = 3 fireball.Name ="HC"
local fireballMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") fireballMesh.MeshType = "FileMesh" fireballMesh.Name = "Mesh" fireballMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=48423624" fireballMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=48598142" fireballMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, 0.2) fireballMesh.Parent = fireball
local massFire
local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Size = 20.0 fire.Heat = 5.0 fire.Parent = fireball fire.Color = Color3.new(1, 0, 0) fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(1, 0, 0)
local fireballClone
local hunkScript
function blow(laser, hit) local humanoid if hit and hit.Parent then humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if hit.Parent.ClassName == "Hat" then humanoid = hit.Parent.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") end vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if humanoid ~= nil and humanoid ~= myHumanoid then tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) humanoid:TakeDamage(20) humanoid.Sit = true local e = Instance.new("Explosion") e.BlastRadius = 2 e.BlastPressure = 0 e.Position = hit.Position e.Parent = game.Workspace end end end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid ~= nil then creator = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creator.Parent = humanoid creator.Value = player creator.Name = "creator" debris:AddItem(creator, 1) end end
function cooldown() wait(45.0) if flightSpin then flightSpin:Remove() end if flightPower then flightPower:Remove() end if flightHold then flightHold:Remove() end ratio = myHumanoid.Health/myHumanoid.MaxHealth myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 100 wait(0.1) myHumanoid.Health = ratio * 100 Tool.Enabled = false if fire then fire:Remove() end if hunkScript and hunkScript:FindFirstChild("Unequipped") then hunkScript.Unequipped.Value = true end wait(15.0) if leftWeld and leftW1 then leftWeld.C1 = leftW1 end if rightWeld and rightW1 then rightWeld.C1 = rightW1 end Tool.Enabled = true Elixir.Transparency = 0.0 if wingActive then wingActive.Value = 0 end end
function fireBeam(beamStart, beamEnd) local distance =(beamStart - beamEnd).magnitude if distance > 150 then distance = 150 end local laser = Instance.new("Part") laser.Name = "Bullet" laser.Anchored = true laser.CanCollide = false laser.Shape = "Block" laser.formFactor = "Custom" laser.Size = Vector3.new(0.2, 0.2, distance + 0.2) laser.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic laser.Locked = true laser.TopSurface = 0 laser.BottomSurface = 0 laser.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright red") laser.CFrame = CFrame.new(beamEnd, beamStart) * CFrame.new(0, 0, -distance/2) laser.Parent = game.Workspace laser.Touched:connect(function(hit) blow(laser, hit) end) debris:AddItem(laser, 0.15) end
function shoot(pos, size, randVec) fireballClone = fireball:Clone() fireballClone.CanCollide = false fireballClone.Anchored = false
if fireballClone:FindFirstChild("Mesh") then fireballClone.Mesh.Scale = fireballClone.Mesh.Scale * size end
fireballClone.Size = fireballClone.Size * Vector3.new(size, size, size)
local spawnPos = vCharacter.PrimaryPart.Position spawnPos = spawnPos + pos.unit * 5.0
fireballClone.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + pos) fireballClone.Velocity = pos * 90.0 -- 25.0 -- 0.1 -- 50.0 fireballClone.Name = "Fireball" fireballClone.Parent = game.Workspace
local fireballCloneFloat = Instance.new("BodyForce") fireballCloneFloat.force = Vector3.new(0.0, fireballClone:GetMass() * 196.1, 0.0) fireballCloneFloat.Parent = fireballClone
fireballClone.Touched:connect(function(hit) blow(fireballClone, hit) end)
debris:AddItem(fireballClone, 7.0) end
function onActivated() vCharacter = Tool.Parent if vCharacter ~= nil then myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid then myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") wingActive = Tool:FindFirstChild("WingActive") if myTorso then if cooldownCo == nil or coroutine.status(cooldownCo) == 'dead' then
hunkScript = Tool.HunkScript:Clone() hunkScript.Parent = vCharacter hunkScript.Disabled = false
Elixir.Transparency = 1.0
ratio = myHumanoid.Health/myHumanoid.MaxHealth myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 250 wait(0.1) myHumanoid.Health = ratio * 250
flightSpin = myTorso:FindFirstChild("FlightSpin") flightPower = myTorso:FindFirstChild("FlightPower") flightHold = myTorso:FindFirstChild("FlightHold") if flightSpin ~= nil or flightPower ~= nil or flightHold ~= nil then debounce = false return end --Tool.Enabled = false if wingActive then print("Setting Wing Active") wingActive.Value = 1 end flightSpin = Instance.new("BodyGyro") flightPower = Instance.new("BodyVelocity")
flightHold = Instance.new("BodyPosition") flightHold.Name = "FlightHold" flightHold.P = 100000 flightHold.maxForce = Vector3.new(0,0,0)
flightPower.Name = "FlightPower" flightPower.velocity = Vector3.new(0,0,0) flightPower.P = 1000000 flightPower.maxForce = Vector3.new(flightPower.P, flightPower.P, flightPower.P) flightPower.P = 10000
flightSpin.Name = "FlightSpin" flightSpin.P = 1000000 flightSpin.maxTorque = Vector3.new(flightSpin.P, flightSpin.P, flightSpin.P)
flightSpin.cframe = myTorso.CFrame flightSpin.Parent = myTorso flightHold.position = myTorso.Position flightHold.Parent = myTorso flightPower.Parent = myTorso
myTorso.Velocity = Vector3.new(0,0,0) myTorso.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0,0,0)
fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Color = Color3.new(1, 0 ,0) fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(1, 0, 0) fire.Heat = 20 fire.Size = 6.0 --fire.Parent = myTorso
cooldownCo = coroutine.create(cooldown) coroutine.resume(cooldownCo)
elseif Tool.Enabled then Tool.Enabled = false if wingActive and wingActive.Value == 1 then local target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint massFire = Tool:FindFirstChild("MassFire") if massFire and massFire.Value == true then -- do st00f myTorso.Anchored = true playAnim = Tool:FindFirstChild("PlayAnim") if playAnim and playAnim.Value == false then playAnim.Value = true end for i = 1, math.random(8, 12) do shoot((myHumanoid.TargetPoint - myTorso.Position).unit, 0.25) wait(0.2) end myTorso.Anchored = false wait(4.0) massFire.Value = false else myTorso.Anchored = true playAnim = Tool:FindFirstChild("PlayAnim") if playAnim and playAnim.Value == false then playAnim.Value = true end wait(1.5) shoot((target - myTorso.Position).unit, 1) myTorso.Anchored = false end end wait(2.5) Tool.Enabled = true end end end end end
function onUnequipped() if flightPower then flightPower:remove() end if flightSpin then flightSpin:remove() end if flightHold then flightHold:remove() end
if leftWing then leftWing:Remove() end if rightWing then rightWing:Remove() end
if myHumanoid then ratio = myHumanoid.Health/myHumanoid.MaxHealth myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 100 wait(0.1) myHumanoid.Health = ratio * 100 end
if hunkScript and hunkScript:FindFirstChild("Unequipped") then hunkScript.Unequipped.Value = true end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Tool = script.Parent
local flightPower local flightSpin local flightHold
local camSpeedZ = 60 local camSpeedX = 40
local forwards = false local back = false local left = false local right = false
local movementHandlerCo
local hover = -.1
local wingActive
local myTorso local myHumanoid local vCharacter
local playAnim
local blastAnim
function handleMovementFrame() local newPush = Vector3.new(0,0,0) local forwardVector = game.Workspace.CurrentCamera.CoordinateFrame:vectorToWorldSpace(Vector3.new(0, 0, -1))
if forwards and not back then newPush = forwardVector * camSpeedZ end if back and not forwards then newPush = newPush + forwardVector * -camSpeedZ end if left and not right then newPush = newPush + game.Workspace.CurrentCamera.CoordinateFrame:vectorToWorldSpace(Vector3.new(-1, 0, 0)) * camSpeedX end if right and not left then newPush = newPush + game.Workspace.CurrentCamera.CoordinateFrame:vectorToWorldSpace(Vector3.new(1, 0, 0)) * camSpeedX end
flightSpin.cframe = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0,0,0), forwardVector) -- have torso face forwards if newPush.magnitude < 1 then flightHold.maxForce = Vector3.new(flightHold.P, flightHold.P, flightHold.P) flightPower.maxForce = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) if myTorso then flightHold.position = myTorso.Position end else flightHold.maxForce = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) flightPower.maxForce = Vector3.new(flightPower.P*100, flightPower.P*100, flightPower.P*100) end flightPower.velocity = newPush end
function handleMovement() wingActive = Tool:FindFirstChild("WingActive") if wingActive then while wingActive.Value == 1 do handleMovementFrame() wait() end end end
function keyUpFunc(key) if key == nil then return end local key = key:lower() if key == "w" then forwards = false elseif key == "a" then left = false elseif key == "s" then back = false elseif key == "d" then right = false end end
function keyDownFunc(key) if key == nil then return end local key = key:lower() if key == "w" then forwards = true elseif key == "a" then left = true elseif key == "s" then back = true elseif key == "d" then right = true elseif key == "q" then massFire = Tool:FindFirstChild("MassFire") if massFire and massFire.Value == false then massFire.Value = true end end end
function wingActivate() wingActive = Tool:FindFirstChild("WingActive") if wingActive then if wingActive.Value == 0 then return end end local vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if myTorso == nil then return end
flightPower = vCharacter.Torso:FindFirstChild("FlightPower") flightSpin = vCharacter.Torso:FindFirstChild("FlightSpin") flightHold = vCharacter.Torso:FindFirstChild("FlightHold")
while flightPower == nil or flightSpin == nil or flightHold == nil do Tool.Parent.Torso.ChildAdded:wait() flightPower = Tool.Parent.Torso:FindFirstChild("FlightPower") flightSpin = Tool.Parent.Torso:FindFirstChild("FlightSpin") flightHold = Tool.Parent.Torso:FindFirstChild("FlightHold") end print("Handling Movement") movementHandlerCo = coroutine.create(handleMovement) coroutine.resume(movementHandlerCo) end
function onEquipped(mouse) print("Equipped") vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if mouse then forwards = false back = false left = false right = false mouse.KeyDown:connect(keyDownFunc) mouse.KeyUp:connect(keyUpFunc) end wingActive = Tool:FindFirstChild("WingActive") if wingActive then print("Connection established") wingActive.Changed:connect(wingActivate) end end
function onUnequipped() if blastAnim then blastAnim:Stop() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
while Tool:FindFirstChild("PlayAnim") == nil do wait() end playAnim = Tool.PlayAnim playAnim.Changed:connect(function() if playAnim and playAnim.Value == true then -- Play the animation blastAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.BlastAnim) if blastAnim then blastAnim:Play() end wait(2.0) playAnim.Value = false end end)

Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

while script:FindFirstChild("Unequipped") == nil do wait() end
local unequipped_BoolValue = script.Unequipped
local vCharacter = script.Parent local myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") local myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso")
local insertTable = {} local headTable = {} local torsoTable = {}
local headColor
local hunkLeftArm = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(32336182) local hunkLeftLeg = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(32336243) local hunkRightArm = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(32336117) local hunkRightLeg = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(32336306) local hunkTorso = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(76215493)
local hunkFace = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(27171262)
--local hunkShirt = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(53062494) local hunkShirt = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(64393082) local hunkPants = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(53062825)
local hunkHead = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(6340213)
if hunkLeftArm then hunkLeftArm = hunkLeftArm:GetChildren() hunkLeftArm = hunkLeftArm[1] end if hunkRightArm then hunkRightArm = hunkRightArm:GetChildren() hunkRightArm = hunkRightArm[1] end if hunkLeftLeg then hunkLeftLeg = hunkLeftLeg:GetChildren() hunkLeftLeg = hunkLeftLeg[1] end if hunkRightLeg then hunkRightLeg = hunkRightLeg:GetChildren() hunkRightLeg = hunkRightLeg[1] end if hunkTorso then hunkTorso = hunkTorso:GetChildren() hunkTorso = hunkTorso[1] end if hunkFace then hunkFace = hunkFace:GetChildren() hunkFace = hunkFace[1] hunkFace.Handle.Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1.2, 1.2, 1.2) end if hunkShirt then hunkShirt = hunkShirt:GetChildren() hunkShirt = hunkShirt[1] end if hunkPants then hunkPants = hunkPants:GetChildren() hunkPants = hunkPants[1] end if hunkHead then hunkHead = hunkHead:GetChildren() hunkHead = hunkHead[1] end
local charChildren = vCharacter:GetChildren() for c = 1, #charChildren do if charChildren[c].className ~= "Part" and charChildren[c].className ~= "Script" and charChildren[c].className ~= "LocalScript" and charChildren[c].className ~= "Humanoid" and charChildren[c].className ~= "Tool" and charChildren[c].className ~= "ForceField" then clone = charChildren[c]:Clone() table.insert(insertTable, clone) end if charChildren[c].Name == "Head" then local headColor = charChildren[c].BrickColor charChildren[c].BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Nougat") headChildren = charChildren[c]:GetChildren() for a =1, #headChildren do if headChildren[a].className == "Decal" or headChildren[a].Name == "Mesh" then clone = headChildren[a]:Clone() table.insert(headTable, clone) end end end if charChildren[c].Name == "Torso" then torsoChildren = charChildren[c]:GetChildren() for x=1, #torsoChildren do if torsoChildren[x].className == "Decal" then clone = torsoChildren[x]:Clone() table.insert(torsoTable, clone) end end end if charChildren[c].Name == "Left Arm" then leftArmColor = charChildren[c].BrickColor charChildren[c].BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Medium stone grey") end if charChildren[c].Name == "Right Arm" then rightArmColor = charChildren[c].BrickColor charChildren[c].BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Medium stone grey") end end
local graphics = vCharacter:GetChildren() for j = 1, #graphics do if graphics[j].className ~= "Part" and graphics[j].className ~= "Script" and graphics[j].className ~= "LocalScript" and graphics[j].className ~= "Humanoid" and graphics[j].className ~= "Tool" and graphics[j].className ~= "ForceField" then graphics[j]:Remove() end if graphics[j].Name == "Head" then headChildren = graphics[j]:GetChildren() for a = 1, #headChildren do if headChildren[a].Name == "Mesh" then headChildren[a]:Remove() end end end end
local bLA = hunkLeftArm:Clone() bLA.Parent = vCharacter local bLL = hunkLeftLeg:Clone() bLL.Parent = vCharacter local bRA = hunkRightArm:Clone() bRA.Parent = vCharacter local bRL = hunkRightLeg:Clone() bRL.Parent = vCharacter local bT = hunkTorso:Clone() bT.Parent = vCharacter
local bFace = hunkFace:Clone() bFace.Parent = vCharacter --local bShirt = hunkShirt:Clone() bShirt.Parent = vCharacter local bPants = hunkPants:Clone() bPants.Parent = vCharacter
local bHead = hunkHead:Clone() bHead.Parent = vCharacter.Head
local charChildren = vCharacter:GetChildren() for c = 1, #graphics do if charChildren[c].Name == "Left Arm" then charChildren[c].BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Medium stone grey") print(vCharacter["Left Arm"].BrickColor, charChildren[c].BrickColor) end if charChildren[c].Name == "Right Arm" then charChildren[c].BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Medium stone grey") end end
function reset() wait()
myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 ratio = myHumanoid.Health/myHumanoid.MaxHealth myHumanoid.Health = ratio * 100 myHumanoid.MaxHealth = 100 end if insertTable ~= nil then if morphResetSound then morphResetSound:Play() end graphics = vCharacter:GetChildren() for j = 1, #graphics do if graphics[j].className ~= "Part" and graphics[j].className ~= "Script" and graphics[j].className ~= "LocalScript" and graphics[j].className ~= "Humanoid" and graphics[j].className ~= "Tool" and graphics[j]:IsA("ForceField") then graphics[j]:Remove() end if graphics[j].Name == "Head" then if headColor then charChildren[c].BrickColor = headColor end headChildren = graphics[j]:GetChildren() for a = 1, #headChildren do if headChildren[a].Name == "Mesh" then headChildren[a]:Remove() end end end if graphics[j].Name == "Right Arm" then graphics[j].BrickColor = rightArmColor end if graphics[j].Name == "Left Arm" then graphics[j].BrickColor = leftArmColor end end for i =1, #insertTable do clone = insertTable[i]:Clone() clone.Parent = vCharacter end for i =1, #headTable do if headTable[i].Name == "Mesh" then clone = headTable[i]:Clone() clone.Parent = vCharacter.Head end end end
wait(1.0) if script then script:Destroy() end end
unequipped_BoolValue.Changed:connect(function() if unequipped_BoolValue and unequipped_BoolValue.Value == true then reset() end end)
wait(45) if unequipped_BoolValue and unequipped_BoolValue.Value == false then reset() end
